name: Hui Guo 0001
content: Dr Hui Guo | UNSW Research Skip to main content Researcher Fields of Research (FoR) Digital processor architectures, Energy-efficient computing, Hardware security, System and network security SEO tags Computer Hardware and Electronic Equipment Expanding Knowledge in the Information and Computing Sciences Expanding Knowledge in the Information and Computing Sciences Biography I received the BE and ME degrees in Electrical and Electronic Engineering from Anhui University in China and PhD in Electrical and Computer Engineering from the University of Queensland in Australia. Prior to joining the University of New South Wales, I worked in several companies in Canada for large information and e-commerce systems. My current research interests include design approaches and customization techniques for embedded systems. ...view more I received the BE and ME degrees in Electrical and Electronic Engineering from Anhui University in China and PhD in Electrical and Computer Engineering from the University of Queensland in Australia. Prior to joining the University of New South Wales, I worked in several companies in Canada for large information and e-commerce systems. My current research interests include design approaches and customization techniques for embedded systems. My Research SupervisionAreas of supervision Security Design for Embedded Systems Design and Customization for Power Efficient Processor Systems Cloud computing and Edge Computing Currently supervising Sajid Hussain Shiyi Yang My Teaching Computer Architecture Microprocessors and Interfacing View less Location Engineering Contact +61 2 9385 7138 Publications by Dr Hui Guo Books 1 Book Chapters 1 Journal articles 18 Conference Papers 41 Preprints 5 View all » ORCID as entered in ROS UNSW Sydney NSW 2052 Australia Telephone +61 2 93851000 Authorised by Deputy Vice-Chancellor (Research) UNSW CRICOS Provider Code: 00098G ABN: 57 195 873 179 Join the conversation Facebook Twitter UNSW Youtube LinkedIn Pinterest Instagram Member Group of Eight Member Universitas 21 Member Global Alliance of Technological Universities Member Association of Pacific Rim Universities MemberPLuS Alliance Home 2025 Strategic Initiatives SHARP UNSW Futures Interdisciplinary Research World Class Research Infrastructure Grand Challenges Thought Leadership & Public Engagement Knowledge Exchange ARTU -
